RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEIDI T stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, shifted out to the six path, rallied under right handed urging while drifting out to the eight path and was along in time. CAPTIVATING ART broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch, drifted out to the six path then couldn't handle the winner. TALK DIRTY trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals outside. AWESOME WONDER hopped at the start, was taken six wide quickly, moved up three wide on the turn, angled inward in upper stretch then was used up. FIVE ROSES LUNA failed to menace. RED LINGERIE chased the pace three wide and gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals, outside

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi T
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, shifted 6path, dug in right urging, in time 8path

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lott's Creek Farm LLC & Christine K. Jones

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, taken 6 wide, middle move, 3 wide, used up

ENTRY.NAME: Five Roses Luna
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Lingerie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Captivating Art
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, drifted 6path, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHORIST unhurried early, advanced steadily in the six path, rallied three wide under right handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker and finished full of run to win going away. AYY LADIES was bumped at the start, sped to the lead along the inside entering the clubhouse turn, set the pace until mid stretch then was no match for the winner but gamely held on for second. BE SHARP pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. SPECIAL ASSISTANT bore in at the start bumping AYY LADIES then failed to menace. PHARIBE had brief speed, dropped before a half then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rushed to lead, set pace mid stretch, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Special Assistant
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, steady advance 6path, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Pharibe
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, dropped back, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Be Sharp
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIBERTY BELLE was antsy in the gate, never far back, surged to the lead with a rapid move in the three path on the far turn then widened through the stretch in the four path to win going away. SCOOP THERE IT IS well placed, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. SUSHI Q broke alertly, set the early pace, kept pressure from the inside into the stretch and was outfinished. NICEASAKITTENSEYES unhurried early, swung wide and rallied belatedly in the seven path. DOMITIA LUCILLA pressed the pace two wide around the first turn, made the lead, set the pace into the far turn then weakened. NO SNIVELING was outrun. STARSHIP MACYS raced wide early and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, quick move 2nd turn, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: No Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Scoop There It Is
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, mild rally 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Macys
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Niceasakittenseyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, belatedly 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, chased inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Domitia Lucilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, led, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $22,000 Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J L'S ROCKETTE away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch, was headed by the runner up then fought back gamely under right handed urging while drifting out to the five path and got back up in time. MAKESCENTSTOUS vied for the lead along the inside, rallied along the rail to make the lead in upper stretch, dug in under right handed urging but couldn't hold off the winner. PULPIT'S PURRFECT pressed the pace two then three wide into the stretch and was outfinished. SHEISTHEHERO was no factor. RENO TOUCH close up four wide, faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Makescentstous
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, rail move, led late, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: J L's Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, headed, fought back gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheisthehero
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Reno Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pulpit's Purrfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2-3wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEZA FINE JUSTICE stalked the early pace, responded with a quick move three wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch then drew off to win as much the best while taken in hand late. MY BELLE MICHELLE trailed into the stretch, closed fast between horses in the six path and got up for second. BEST OF YOU allowed to settle, rallied three wide in the seven path through the stretch and finished on even terms with MY BELLE MICHELLE at the wire. OPULENT dueled for the lead along the inside for a half, drifted to the six path entering the stretch then was outfinished. BEEBLEGEE failed to menace. PROPHETESS moved up inside rivals on the turn then came up empty. SO GO MY LUCEILLE battled for the lead two wide for a half then stopped. DUR TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FINAL TIME WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FINAL TIME CHANGED AND FRACTIONS PROVIDED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetess
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: dh-My Belle Michelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast, between horses, up

ENTRY.NAME: Opulent
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside half, drifted 6path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Best of You
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally 3 wide, 7path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, quick move, 3 wide turn, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: So Go My Luceille
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, stopped lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEST PILOT delayed the start while reluctant to load, was bumped entering the first turn, stalked the pace into the far turn, rallied to wide to gained a narrow lead at the top of the stretch and proved best in a stretch long drive. THE HONORABLE ONE pressed the pace two wide around the first turn, gained a narrow lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch, matched stride then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages while finishing well clear for second. GRAND DEAL angled out bumping the winner into the clubhouse turn, was unhurried then passed a tiring rival late. EL SICARIO set the early pace along the inside, had speed into the stretch then gave way. JEBIP trailed. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FINAL TIME WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out, bumped foe 15/16pole, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: El Sicario
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, speed to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: The Honorable One
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, long drive inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Test Pilot
ENTRY.OWNER: Bunning Susan S and Kenneally Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: wouldn't load, bumped 15/16p, stalked, long drive 2w, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Jebip
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 28. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DARK OAK sprinted up to make the lead five wide just past the half mile pole, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ridden out. LAUDA SPEED chased the pace, dug in late in the four path late and gamely gained second. FAHRENHEIT set the early pace under pressure, remained a sharp threat along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. PAT DADDY moved up three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. ASTRO JAK bore in bumping HAPPULEA at the start, had speed for a half then faded. HAPPILEA was bumped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Jak
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, speed half, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Fahrenheit
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, chased, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, 5 wide, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, dug in 4path, gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOTELLYOUTHETRUTH prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, dug in under right handed urging and was along in time. IT'S YOUR CALL never far back, had a mild late rally in the six path and finished second best. GOING WITH STYLE stalked the pace four wide into the stretch, drifted to the eight path and went evenly. PLAY BALL bore out at the start bumping rivals, had his heels clipped, sprinted to the lead soon thereafter, set the pace until deep stretch and weakened late. SPEEDY MOBILE was bumped at the start, moved up along the rail through the turn then came up empty. MOESTER was bumped, squeezed between rivals, clipped heels and fell at the start. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Play Ball
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, heels clipped, pace, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Moester
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed, clipped heels, fell start, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Going With Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, drifted, 8path lane, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Totellyouthetruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, rallied 5path, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: It's Your Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally 6path, second best,
